exec git init
exec lefthook dump
cmp stdout lefthook-dumped.yml
! stderr .

exec lefthook dump --json
cmp stdout lefthook-dumped.json
! stderr .

exec lefthook dump --toml
cmp stdout lefthook-dumped.toml
! stderr .

-- lefthook.yml --
colors:
  cyan: 14
  gray: 244
  green: '#32CD32'
  red: '#FF1493'
  yellow: '#F0E68C'
pre-commit:
  follow: true
  commands:
    lint:
      interactive: true
      skip:
        - merge
        - rebase
        - ref: main
      run: yarn lint {staged_files}
    test:
      skip: merge
      glob: "*.js"
      run: yarn test
-- lefthook-dumped.yml --
colors:
  cyan: 14
  gray: 244
  green: '#32CD32'
  red: '#FF1493'
  yellow: '#F0E68C'
pre-commit:
  commands:
    lint:
      run: yarn lint {staged_files}
      skip:
        - merge
        - rebase
        - ref: main
      interactive: true
    test:
      run: yarn test
      skip: merge
      glob: '*.js'
  follow: true
